location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 110: Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, HC Sloop Clive, at Sea, to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter to Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, refers to Kemball's letter of 19 July (no. 214) and reports on his recent visit to the lower end of the Gulf. He provides information concerning the attempts of Abdullah Ben Fyzul [Faisal bin Turki bin Abdullah Āl Sa‘ūd, ruler of the Second Saudi State] to recover the remaining portion of the tribute promised to him from the Batinah [Al-Bāṭinah] provinces by Said Sweeney [Sayyid Thuwaynī bin Sa‘id al-Sa‘id].
